titles: Seven Portuguese letters being a second part to the five love-letters from a nun to a cavalier : one of the most passionate [p]ieces that possibly ever has been extant.
author: Guilleragues, Gabriel Joseph de Lavergne, vicomte de, 1628-1685.
Alcoforado, Mariana, 1640-1723.
Chamilly, Noël Bouton, marquis de, 1636-1715.
notes: Long attributed to Mariana Alcoforado, the letters are supposed to have been addressed to Noël Bouton, marquis de Chamilly in the year 1668 -- NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Guilleragues, Gabriel Joseph de Lavergne, --  vicomte de, 1628-1685.
